definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Only in Canada are people celebrated for saying no.
sentences.chinese: 只有在加拿大，會因說“不”而爲人稱道。

sentences.english: The two south and the north of the developers really commendable development.
sentences.chinese: 上述一南一北兩個樓盤的開發商確實值得稱道。

sentences.english: But what it is best known for is its images.
sentences.chinese: 但是它最爲人所稱道的是雜誌中的精美圖片。

sentences.english: This is referred to as the Confucian Road "music rituals" of the theme.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲儒家所稱道的“制禮作樂”的主題思想。

sentences.english: Misers are no fun to live,but they make great ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 與吝嗇鬼生活毫無樂趣，但他們卻爲後人稱道不已。

sentences.english: Most frequently cited plus-points among expat readers are the levels of cleanliness and safety on Tokyo’s streets.
sentences.chinese: 東京最被人稱道的地方是乾淨而安全的街道。

sentences.english: Are lying in their lowly beds, with the fair and good of ours.
sentences.chinese: 帶着我們稱道的美麗和善良，低臥土牀板。

sentences.english: The method of his organisation work is worth commending.
sentences.chinese: 他的組織工作的方法值得稱道。

sentences.english: The German chancellor's leadership in shoring up Europe's finances is commendable.
sentences.chinese: 德國總理在重組歐洲金融中所起的領導作用值得稱道。

sentences.english: It is really exciting to be able to get a passport in an even shorter time than the time spent in buying a train ticket.
sentences.chinese: 辦本護照比買張火車票還容易，實在令人稱道。

sentences.english: Thou sayest, Men cannot admire the sharpness of thy wits.
sentences.chinese: 你說，你的智慧無法讓衆人稱道。

sentences.english: His moral character and habits are praiseworthy .
sentences.chinese: 他的道德品質和性情值得稱道。

sentences.english: He claimed that the weapons had been planted on him.
sentences.chinese: 他稱道，那武器是別人給他栽的贓。

sentences.english: Misers are no fun to live with, but they make great ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 與吝嗇鬼生活毫無樂趣，但他們卻爲後人稱道不已。

sentences.english: The Parisian police, so much extolled for acumen, are cunning, but no more.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎警察一向以智慧稱道於世，實在不外是桀黠罷了。

sentences.english: This will let you discover all the genuinely nice things about people.
sentences.chinese: 這會讓你發現他人身上所有美好的，值得稱道的優點。
